tool_description: API downloader for Youtube, Instagram, Facebook, Tiktok, Twitter, Vimeo, Soundcloud, and others.
title: Popular Video Downloader

api_list.name: Instagram video post download
Vimeo video download
Youtube download

required_parameters.name: videoUrl
required_parameters.description: Allowed format url for youtube single video, playlist, or short

api_list.name: Ted video download
M3U8 Downloader
api_list.description:
Download m3u8 files directly to video.
You have to download generated file after converting because it will be deleted after 2 hours.

**NOTE:** max size allowed to download as listed below:
- PRO : 1 Gb
- ULTRA : 3 Gb
- MEGA : 7 Gb

required_parameters.name: videoUrl
required_parameters.description: Enter m3u8 link here, some premium or live videos may be restricted for downloading

api_list.name: Check File
api_list.description: Check whether file is available or not after processing

required_parameters.name: filename
required_parameters.description:
Add your full file name with extesion here to check the file in our server.

**Note:** Do not enter full path, only file name.

api_list.name: Extract Video Without Sound
api_list.description:
Extract video only from popular video website without sound.
You have to download generated file after converting because it will be deleted after 2 hours.

required_parameters.name: videoUrl
required_parameters.description: Supported website as in the description, like youtube, facebook, instagram, twitter, etc.

api_list.name: Convert Video to MP3
api_list.description:
Convert video from popular video website to mp3.
You have to download generated file after converting because it will be deleted after 2 hours.

required_parameters.name: videoUrl
required_parameters.description: Supported website as in the description, like youtube, facebook, instagram, twitter, etc.

api_list.name: Utreon video download
Base64 Encode

required_parameters.name: string
required_parameters.description: Must be url encode before submitting

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://popular-video-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/base64/encode/{string}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "popular-video-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Base64 Decode
api_list.description: Decode base64 string to plain text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://popular-video-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/base64/decode/{string}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "popular-video-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
